content: this is a simple beginner-friendly and quick crochet ear warmer with a jacob s ladder cable stitch detail it takes 50g of dk yarn and a 4mm hook so it s also a great stash-buster this ear warmer is made flat and worked until 19 inches of length before being seamed up at the back it is adjustable if this doesn t fit you the pattern uses uk terms and chain double and treble_crochet stitches gauge isn t important for this pattern but please use a dk weight yarn
